cohortName: [PL 4169095001] Bradycardia referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4169095) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4169095002] Bradycardia referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4169095) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4169095003] Bradycardia or heart block during hospitalization, defined by conditions, devices and procedures
[PL 4169095004] Bradycardia prevalent cohort, defined by first condition occurrence of 'Bradycardia' with a condition occurrence of 'Bradycardia' anytime after the first event
